Articles.Content:
Welcome everyone. Introducing the Kommunity Space Program!

 

The goal here is to do certain achievements and space missions and passing it to each other for them to do their thing. Kinda like Kommunity Space Station, except you'll be doing more than just stations. Now, to break down the rules...

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Rule #1: Everything must be stock; no mods allowed.

Rule #2: No Alt+F12 or Hyperedit to move craft (unless you made a stargate with stock parts).

Rule #3: Album or video required per mission.

Rule #4: Stations can only have a max of 20 separate modules.

Rule #5: Anyone who will make their mission must make their own custom flags to discern whose is whose.

Rule #6: No combat; that goes into the Naval Battle League thread under Forum Games.

Rule #7: Have fun... (youtuber YourMCAdmin will kill me)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Save for Version 1.2.2:

Save for Version 1.3:

Save for Version 1.3.1:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Now, the next poster must have their save; that is the starting point. Or they can just say "Hold mah beer."

Edited November 3, 2017 by Joseph Kerman
I wanna do this. why has no one else posted yet?

Just add your save file.

Apparently, no one else is a station fanatic.
